params.admin: The address to add as admin

params.operator: The address to add as operator

params.initialOwner: The initial owner of the contract

returns.fulfilled: Whether the request has been fulfilled
returns.requester: The address that made the request

returns._0: True if the address is an admin
True if the address is an operator

returns.ready: Whether the adapter is properly configured

returns.fulfilled: Whether the request has been fulfilled

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.admin: The address to remove from admins

params.operator: The address to remove from operators

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.numWords: The number of random words to request

returns.requestId: The unique identifier for this randomness request

params._delay: Number of blocks to wait before allowing fulfillment

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._callbackGasLimit: The gas limit for the callback
params._keyHash: The key hash for the VRF

getRandomness(bytes32).notice: Get the randomness for a fulfilled request

getRequestStatus(bytes32).notice: Get the status of a randomness request
